function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using blockchain technology for tracking COVID-19 infections among humans","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks of tracking individuals' movements and health data","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy policies, data anonymization, and secure encryption for data on the blockchain","Technologies":"Data anonymization, secure encryption, blockchain consensus algorithms","People":"Infectious disease experts, policymakers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Supply chain transparency using blockchain technology","Impact":"Potential data manipulation, counterfeit goods, and security breaches in the medical supply chain","Mitigation":"Implement blockchain-based authentication, secure linking, and transaction monitoring","Technologies":"Blockchain authentication, secure linking, transaction monitoring","People":"Healthcare supply chain managers, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Medical supply chain stakeholders, regulatory authorities"}]}
